member.name: T:FortunaExcelProcessing.CheckCellData
member.summary: This class is utilized to check cell information, process it and return it

member.name: M:FortunaExcelProcessing.CheckCellData.CellTypeString(NPOI.SS.UserModel.ICell)
member.summary: Method for processing any cells that have a string value in them. It also allows for conversion of numeric values. Return is always a string

member.name: M:FortunaExcelProcessing.CheckCellData.CellWeirdDate(NPOI.SS.UserModel.ICell)
member.summary: This method is used for dates that do not appear in a typic dd:MM:YYYY way Most dates within the Weekly Data reports will be formatted as 'Jan 6'

member.name: M:FortunaExcelProcessing.CheckCellData.CellTypeNumeric(NPOI.SS.UserModel.ICell)
member.summary: Reads in a numeric cell and returns a number. If -1 is returned assume that the cell is not a numeric format.

member.name: M:FortunaExcelProcessing.CheckCellData.CellTypeDate(NPOI.SS.UserModel.ICell)
member.summary: Method for processing typical dates that can be understood using C#'s datetime without formatting.

member.name: M:FortunaExcelProcessing.CheckCellData.CellTypeUnknown(NPOI.SS.UserModel.ICell)
member.summary: Currently throws an exception, in the future this method is intended to diagnose and return a value for a cell that the user doesn't know the value for.

member.name: M:FortunaExcelProcessing.ConsilidatedReport.ConsolUtil.getNumberofFarms
member.summary: Recieves the JSON file as a respose, then substrings expected information out of it.
member.remarks: I still feel 'stripper' is a somewhat questionable variable name.
member.returns: Returns integer value that is parsed from a substring pulled from a JSON file.

member.name: M:FortunaExcelProcessing.ErrorHandling.ErrorReporter.CheckStatus
member.summary: Calls methods to process errors dependent on how many error are in the list

member.name: T:FortunaExcelProcessing.WeeklySheetFactory
member.summary:
This is a factory class that takes in a sheet name and then determines what method to call.
The only return value is a selected class in the WeeklyProcessing namespace

member.name: T:PaddockColumns
member.summary: The PaddockColumns enumerator is utilized outside of the library

member.name: T:Util
member.summary: The Util class is full of misc. methods that aid various other classes, think of it as a bunch of scrappy tools. The Util class should not be confused with the ConsolUtil class that is intended for code working with the Consolidated report.

member.name: M:Util.DForm
member.summary: Returns the string used for DateTime formatting, for the database inserts
